Package edboy.shapes

Class Shape2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • edboy.shapes.Shape
      • edboy.shapes.Shape2D
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Rectangle, RegularPolygon
    public abstract class Shape2D
extends Shape
    A shape superclass for only 2D shapes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Shape2D​(double x, double y)
      Creates a 2D shape while setting all its fields to 0 and fill is set to true
      Shape2D​(double x, double y, int stroke, int strokeWeight)
      Creates a 2D shape while setting all its fields to 0 and fill is set to true

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D​(double x,
               double y)
        Creates a 2D shape while setting all its fields to 0 and fill is set to true
        Parameters:
        x - the starting x cord of the shape
        y - the starting y cord of the shape

      • Shape2D

        public Shape2D​(double x,
               double y,
               int stroke,
               int strokeWeight)
        Creates a 2D shape while setting all its fields to 0 and fill is set to true
        Parameters:
        x - the starting x cord of the shape
        y - the starting y cord of the shape
        stroke - sets the stroke color on a gray scale
        strokeWeight - the thickness of the lines

    • Method Detail

      • fillShape

        public void fillShape​(boolean fill)
        Sets the object's fill field
        Parameters:
        fill - true or false depending if you want to fill in the shape

      • fillColor

        public void fillColor​(int red,
                      int green,
                      int blue)
        Sets the fill color of the object
        Parameters:
        red - sets the rgb value of red
        green - sets the rgb value of green
        blue - sets the rgb value of blue

      • getPerimeter

        public abstract double getPerimeter()
        Returns:
        Returns the perimeter of the shape

      • getArea

        public abstract double getArea()
        Returns:
        Returns the area of the shape

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside​(double x,
                                      double y)
        Checks if input point is inside the shape
        Parameters:
        x - the x cord of the check point
        y - the y cord of the check point
        Returns:
        true or false depending on if the point is inside the shape

      • scale

        public abstract void scale​(int value)
        Scales the object from its top left corner
        Parameters:
        value - the multiplier of scaling
